00018 t_pgrid::t_pgrid()
00019 {
00020     if(instance) return;
00021     
00022     instance= this;
00023     
00024     puts("screen init");
00025     screen.init(640, 480, false);
00026     
00027     editor= new t_editor(this);
00028     
00029     t_workspace *newws= new t_workspace(this);
00030     workspaces.push_back(newws);
00031     
00032     physicstime= 0;
00033 }
00034 
00035 t_pgrid::~t_pgrid()
00036 {
00037     for(int i= workspaces.size()-1; i>=0; i--)
00038         delete workspaces[i];
00039     delete editor;
00040     instance= 0;
00041 }

00043 void t_pgrid::runphysics()
00044 {
00045     const float time= PHYSICSFRAMEMILLIS/1000.0;
00046     while(physicstime<curmillis)
00047     {
00048         editor->phys_tick(time);
00049         current_workspace()->image->phys_tick(time);
00050         
00051         physicstime+= PHYSICSFRAMEMILLIS;
00052     }
00053 }
00054 
00055 void t_pgrid::run()
00056 {
00057     bool quit= false;
00058     
00059     setvbuf(stdout, 0, _IONBF, 0);
00060     
00061     SDL_EnableKeyRepeat(SDL_DEFAULT_REPEAT_DELAY, SDL_DEFAULT_REPEAT_INTERVAL);
00062     SDL_WM_SetCaption("pgrid", "pgrid");
00063     
00064     lastmillis= curmillis= SDL_GetTicks();
00065     int synthmouse= 5;
00066     //~ SDL_WM_GrabInput(SDL_GRAB_ON);
00067     while(!quit)
00068     {
00069         lastframephystime= physicstime;
00070         lastmillis= curmillis;
00071         curmillis= SDL_GetTicks();
00072         
00073         SDL_Event event;
00074         int lasttype= 0, lastbtn= 0;
00075         while(SDL_PollEvent(&event))
00076         {
00077             switch(event.type)
00078             {
00079                 case SDL_KEYDOWN:
00080                 case SDL_KEYUP:
00081                     keystate[event.key.keysym.sym]= (event.key.state==SDL_PRESSED? 1: 0);
00082                     current_workspace()->keyboard_event(event.key);
00083                     editor->keyboard_event(event.key);
00084                     for(t_dyninputhandler_list::iterator i= dyninputhandlers.begin(); i!=dyninputhandlers.end(); i++)
00085                         (*i)->keyboard_event(event.key);
00086                     break;
00087                 case SDL_MOUSEMOTION:
00088                     mouse.x= event.motion.x;
00089                     mouse.y= event.motion.y;
00090                     mouse.buttons= event.motion.state;
00091                     current_workspace()->mouse_motion_event(event.motion);
00092                     editor->mouse_motion_event(event.motion);
00093                     for(t_dyninputhandler_list::iterator i= dyninputhandlers.begin(); i!=dyninputhandlers.end(); i++)
00094                         (*i)->mouse_motion_event(event.motion);
00095                     break;
00096                 case SDL_MOUSEBUTTONUP:
00097                     mouse.buttons&= ~(SDL_BUTTON(event.button.button));
00098                     goto button_event;
00099                 case SDL_MOUSEBUTTONDOWN:
00100                     mouse.buttons|= SDL_BUTTON(event.button.button);
00101                     button_event:
00102                     mouse.x= event.button.x;
00103                     mouse.y= event.button.y;
00104                     current_workspace()->mouse_button_event(event.button);
00105                     editor->mouse_button_event(event.button);
00106                     for(t_dyninputhandler_list::iterator i= dyninputhandlers.begin(); i!=dyninputhandlers.end(); i++)
00107                         (*i)->mouse_button_event(event.button);
00108                     break;
00109 
00110                 case SDL_QUIT:
00111                     quit= true;
00112                     break;
00113                 
00114                 case SDL_VIDEORESIZE:
00115                 {
00116                     SDL_Surface *surf= SDL_SetVideoMode(event.resize.w, event.resize.h, 0, SDL_OPENGL|SDL_RESIZABLE);
00117                     if(!surf) break;
00118                     screen.sdl_surface= surf;
00119                     screen.gl_init(event.resize.w, event.resize.h);
00120                     current_workspace()->centerimage();
00121                     break;
00122                 }
00123             }
00124         }
00125 
00126         runphysics();
00127         
00128         glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT);
00129         
00130         current_workspace()->render();
00131         
00132         int x, y;
00133         SDL_GetRelativeMouseState(&x, &y);
00134         mousevel.x= x; mousevel.y= y;
00135         mousevel.mul( 1000.0/(curmillis-lastmillis) );
00136         
00137         SDL_GetMouseState(&x, &y);
00138         mousepos.x= x; mousepos.y= y;
00139 
00140         SDL_GL_SwapBuffers();
00141         checkglerror();
00142         
00143         int delay= 10 - (curmillis-lastmillis);
00144         if(delay>0) SDL_Delay(delay);
00145     }
00146 }

00148 t_pgrid *t_pgrid::instance;
00149 t_pgrid *t_pgrid::getinstance()
00150 {
00151     if(!instance) new t_pgrid();
00152     return instance;
00153 }
